name: DwarfCorp (itch)
description:
In DwarfCorp, lead a colony of ruthless capitalist dwarves in their quest for profit in a strange new land inhabited by hostile and savage creatures. Build your colony from scratch, trade with the natives, broker deals with the dwarven motherland, and defend your colony from invaders and monsters.

Featuring

  • A procedurally generated 3D world full of hazards
  • Building above and underground
  • Crafting, trade and war
  • Animal husbandry and farming
  • Magical research
  • Goblins, Molemen, Elves, Demons and the Undead
  • Employees with needs, personalities and opportunities for advancement
  • A mix of 3D graphics and pixel art
  • An open-source development process
